languages.text: "Ты не удивлен, что слова Амарната произвели такое впечатление на Оптикона-22?"
"Are you not surprised that Amarnat's words had such an effect on Opticon-22?"
languages.original_text: "Ты не удивлен, что слова Амарната произвели такое впечатление на Оптикона-22?"

traits.locale_text: "Are you not surprised that Amarnat's words had such an effect on Opticon-22?"
"Are you not surprised that Amarnat's words had such an effect on Opticon-22?"
"Are you not surprised that Amarnat's words had such an effect on Opticon-22?"
"Are you not surprised that Amarnat's words had such an effect on Opticon-22?"
"Are you not surprised that Amarnat's words had such an effect on Opticon-22?"

languages.text: “阿玛纳特的话竟然对奥普蒂孔22号产生了这样的影响，你就不惊讶吗？”
languages.original_text: "Are you not surprised that Amarnat's words had such an effect on Opticon-22?"

traits.locale_text: “阿玛纳特的话竟然对奥普蒂孔22号产生了这样的影响，你就不惊讶吗？”

languages.text: «¿No le sorprende el efecto de las palabras de Amarnat sobre Opticon-22?».
languages.original_text: "Are you not surprised that Amarnat's words had such an effect on Opticon-22?"

traits.locale_text: «¿No le sorprende el efecto de las palabras de Amarnat sobre Opticon-22?».

languages.text: 「アマルナトの言葉がこれほどオプティコン-22に影響を与えていたことには驚かないのか？」
languages.original_text: "Are you not surprised that Amarnat's words had such an effect on Opticon-22?"

traits.locale_text: 「アマルナトの言葉がこれほどオプティコン-22に影響を与えていたことには驚かないのか？」

languages.text: "Wundert es Euch nicht, dass Amarnats Worte eine solche Wirkung auf Opticon-22 hatten?"
languages.original_text: "Are you not surprised that Amarnat's words had such an effect on Opticon-22?"

traits.locale_text: "Wundert es Euch nicht, dass Amarnats Worte eine solche Wirkung auf Opticon-22 hatten?"

languages.text: « Vous n'êtes pas surpris que les paroles d'Amarnat aient eu un tel effet sur Opticon-22 ? »
languages.original_text: "Are you not surprised that Amarnat's words had such an effect on Opticon-22?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous n'êtes pas surpris que les paroles d'Amarnat aient eu un tel effet sur Opticon-22 ? »

languages.text: "Amarnat'ın sözlerinin Opticon-22 üzerinde böylesine etkili olması seni şaşırtmadı mı?"
languages.original_text: "Are you not surprised that Amarnat's words had such an effect on Opticon-22?"

traits.locale_text: "Amarnat'ın sözlerinin Opticon-22 üzerinde böylesine etkili olmasına şaşırmadın mı?"
